text: Hotel Abkhazia Sokhumi was a hotel in Sukhumi, Abkhazia, Georgia during the Soviet period. The hotel was one of the city's most prominent hotels. The white building is currently defunct and empty. ==References== ==External links== *Image Category:Hotels in Abkhazia Category:Sukhumi Category:Hotels built in the Soviet Union Category:Defunct hotels
title: Hotel Abkhazia Sukhumi
